entry.title: Version 0.4.2 Released
entry.para: Version 0.4.2, a maintenance release, is available. See the change log for more information.

entry.title: Version 0.4.1 Released
entry.para: Version 0.4.1 is out. This version fixes a few small bugs and adds some new features. Read the change log for more information.

entry.title: Version 0.4.0 Released
entry.para: Version 0.4.0 is out. This version adds support for XSLT.

entry.title: Version 0.3.0 Has Been Released
entry.para: Version 0.3.0 is out, and with it comes a lot of new features. Read the change log and download the source!

entry.title: Bug fix release 0.2.2 is out
entry.para: Version 0.2.2 is out. It contains a major bug fix in xml::tree_parser.

entry.title: Bug fix release 0.2.1 is out
entry.para: Version 0.2.1 is out. It contains a few bug fixes. It also has a new Win32 MSVC 6 project file.

entry.title: First public version of xmlwrapp is out!
entry.para: Unlike version 0.1.0 of xmlwrapp, version 0.2.0 is a stand-alone version ready for public consumption. This version now includes a developers manual and example applications.

entry.title: xmlwrapp version 0.1.0 is out!
entry.para: The first release of xmlwrapp is out. This version was released to support version 0.5.0 of clo++.

entry.para: xmlwrapp gets a home on the web.
